function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Superspreading events leading to majority transmission of COVID-19","Impact":"High secondary infections and attack rates","Mitigation":"Limiting large gatherings and implementing strict contact tracing measures","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, genomic sequencing, and surveillance systems","People":"General public, event organizers, and healthcare workers","Owner":"Health authorities and event organizers"},{"Description":"High population density facilitating disease transmission","Impact":"Increased susceptibility to disease and sustained disease transmission","Mitigation":"Improving housing conditions, sanitation, and healthcare access, and implementing social distancing measures","Technologies":"Urban planning, sanitation infrastructure, and public health education","People":"Overcrowded communities and disadvantaged populations","Owner":"Government agencies and community organizations"},{"Description":"Lockdowns reducing community transmission but halting economic activity","Impact":"Decimated economy and increased vulnerability","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions for equitable housing, infrastructure, and healthcare access to reduce vulnerability","Technologies":"Remote work solutions, economic stimulus packages, and public health campaigns","People":"General public, businesses, and policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies and businesses"}]}
